avg_daily_spend_30d: Average amount the customer spends per day over the last 30 days.
avg_daily_spend_90d: Average amount the customer spends per day over the last 90 days.
current_day: The current calendar day (1 to 31), used to understand billing cycle timing.
sim_age_days: How many days the SIM card has been active.
avg_main_balance_30d: Average balance in the customer’s main account over the last 30 days.
avg_main_balance_90d: Average balance in the customer’s main account over the last 90 days.
total_main_recharge_amt_90d: Total amount recharged into the main balance over the last 90 days.
median_main_pre_balance_90d: Median balance before each recharge over the last 90 days.
total_main_recharge_amt_30d: Total amount recharged into the main balance over the last 30 days.
median_pre_balance_30d: Median balance before each recharge over the last 30 days.
last_recharge_month: Month in which the customer last recharged.
main_recharge_freq_90d: How many times the customer recharged in the last 90 days.
main_recharge_freq_30d: How many times the customer recharged in the last 30 days.
avg_payback_time_90d: Average time taken to pay back loans over the last 90 days.
avg_payback_time_30d: Average time taken to pay back loans over the last 30 days.
daily_spend: The customer’s estimated daily usage-based spending.
monthly_spend: The customer’s total spending for the month.
current_balance: The customer’s balance at the time of prediction.
recharge_count_last_month: How many times the customer topped up in the most recent month.
recharge_amount_last_month: Total recharge amount added during the last 30 days.
late_payment_flag: Indicates whether the customer previously delayed paying back a loan.
spend_ratio_30_90: Ratio comparing spending behaviour between 30-day and 90-day periods.
recharge_ratio_30_90: Ratio comparing recharge patterns between 30-day and 90-day periods.
balance_drop_rate: Rate at which the customer’s balance decreases after spending events.
loan_usage_pattern: Behaviour pattern related to how the customer uses and repays telecom loans.
high_risk_event_flag: Flags behaviour patterns historically linked with high delinquency.
engagement_score: A score reflecting customer activity, usage, and recharge frequency.
stability_index: Score estimating how stable and predictable the customer’s behaviour is.
month: Numeric month representing the time period when prediction is made.
recent_recharge_trend: Trend line showing whether the customer's recharge frequency is rising or falling.
recent_spend_trend: Trend showing if spending is increasing or decreasing.
long_term_value: A long-term indicator based on historical revenue and engagement.
usage_category: Segments the customer based on their usage pattern for better risk prediction.
